# depthModuleTemperature

**Type Property**

The module capturing depth information is operating at an elevated temperature.

## Declaration

```swift
static var depthModuleTemperature: AVCaptureDevice.SystemPressureState.Factors { get }
```

## Discussion

As system pressure increases, depth quality may become degraded. To reduce system pressure from this factor, reduce depth capture frame rate.

This factor applies only to [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/DeviceType-swift.struct/builtInTrueDepthCamera] devices.

## System pressure factors

- **systemTemperature**: The entire system is under elevated thermal load.
- **peakPower**: The system’s peak power requirements exceed the battery’s current capacity.
- **cameraTemperature**: The camera module is operating at an elevated temperature.
